text: 3:46 @ 4o ™M e ¥R 88 @ 46+ il [ 18% Suppose a router has built up the routing table shown below. The router can deliver packets directly over interfaces 0 and 1, or it can forward packets to routers R2, R3, or R4. SubnetNumber | SubnetMask NextHop 128.96.39.0 255.255.255.128 | Interface 0 128.96.39.128 255.255.255.128 | Interface 1 128.96.40.0 255.255.255.128 | R2 192.4.153.0 255.255.255.192 | R3 (default) R4 Which the following statements is/are true: A. For a packet addressed to the destination 128.96.39.10, router uses R4 as the next hop. B. For a packet addressed to the destination 128.96.40.12, router uses R2 as the next hop. C. For a packet addressed to the destination 192.4.153.17, router uses R3 as the next hop. D. For a packet addressed to the destination 192.4.153.90, router uses R4 as the next hop. Your Answer: Correct Answer: B;C;D m
